law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 7, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Payment of taxes on farms or other closely held businesses.
